MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 Postcode area of Weaverham, affecting properties in Sandy Lane and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:51PM. Our emergency response team are currently on site carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:20PM on 15th February 2021
